CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function does not sanitize the input before using it in a regular expression and HTML tag name. This could lead to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks if the input is controlled by an attacker. An attacker could inject malicious scripts that would be executed in the context of the victim's session.
